column4: On the drive you'll be dual-booting, are there files you need?
Do you plan on being on the Win7 partition a lot?
Ubuntu will do the special partitioning of /, swap, etc.
If I remember, it says 'Resize /dev/sd[a-z][\d]' and use freed space' or something close to that. At least it did last time I used the desktop installer.
